name: Dice Punk
description:
Who will be the greatest die of them all? The ultimate contest of dice trying to beat each other up in a feature-less white void! Survive! Plan! Kill! Get a high score with careful planning!

The project is not what we'd call finished - our first foray into 3D slowed us down - but should opperate as a proof of concept.

How To Play:

  • Click and drag to move the camera!
  • WASD to move
    • The first press will show your pattern of attack if you commit to the move.
    • The second press of the same direction will commit the move.
    • Pressing a different key will act as a first press.
  • Enemies will move towards you and their attack patterns on their next turn are displayed.
    • All enemies are defeated in a single hit and award a single point.
  • Kill to heal!
